original_text: These are the clans of Noah’s sons, according to their lines of descent, within their nations. From these the nations spread out over the earth after the flood.
korean_text: 이들은 그 백성들의 족보에 따르면 노아 자손의 족속들이요 홍수 후에 이들에게서 그 땅의 백성들이 나뉘었더라

sentences.original_text: These are the clans of Noah's sons
according to their lines of descent
From these the nations spread out
over the earth after the flood
